projects.title: Check out my latest work
projects.description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Want to chat? Just shoot me a dm with a direct question on twitter and I'll respond whenever I can. I will ignore all soliciting.

profile.description: A skilled mobile developer with 5 years of experience, focusing on application development, UI/UX design, and innovation. Proficient in mobile technologies, I've successfully delivered user-centric solutions. Skilled in project management and dedicated to crafting high-quality apps that meet client needs.

wiicode.title: Flutter Developer
wiicode.description: TheCyrele Mobile Application development with clean architecture and TDD approach.
tasks: Convert high-fidelity designs into fully responsive Flutter apps based on a clean and flexible Dart code
Implement a solid and clean architecture based on Test Driven Development
Fetch and manage data from Firebase Firestore, Realtime Database, and custom APIs
Allow users to request rides, view driver details, and handle payments securely
Managed the technical team for the launch of BKG SPEED in Senegal
Write some stress tests to check the app health and potential failures

clickafrica.title: Lead Flutter Developer
clickafrica.description: KLIC: On-demand service app development with comprehensive features and team management.
tasks: Convert high-fidelity designs into responsive Flutter apps and apply UI requirements
Implement real-time driver tracking using Google Maps
Fetch and manage data from Firebase Firestore, Realtime Database, and custom APIs

Conduct testing, optimize performance, and ensure bug-free app operation
Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated testing, deployment, and continuous improvement
Provide comprehensive documentation for code, architecture, and security measures

trendz.description: Event management platform with 3 mobile apps (iOS/Android) built in Flutter. Features include Firebase authentication, mobile payments, real-time data sync, and automated CI/CD deployment.

molory.description: Mobile application suite with 3 Flutter apps for iOS and Android. Implements Firebase integration, local caching with Hive, payment processing, and user feedback systems.

thecyrele.description: Ride-sharing mobile application built with Flutter using Test Driven Development. Features real-time tracking, secure payments, and comprehensive testing framework.

klic.description: On-demand service app similar to Uber and Uber Eats. Built with Flutter featuring real-time GPS tracking, payment integration, rating system, and admin dashboards.

pavs.description: Desktop application for account management built with Flutter. Features user authentication, real-time data sync with Socket.io, and dual theme support.

cataloguePavsApp.description: Android product catalog app with Firebase integration. Manages product inventory, prices, and orders with Google authentication.
